reasoning: Familial PAH (FPAH) is an extremely rare genetic form of pulmonary arterial hypertension. Estimated at <0.1 per 100k based on registry data showing FPAH represents ~6% of idiopathic PAH cases which itself is ~1-2 per million.
source: Humbert M et al. (2006). Pulmonary arterial hypertension in France: results from a national registry. Am J Respir Crit Care Med. 173(9):1023-30
